articles.title: What to know about U.S.-Israel attacks on Iran
articles.description:
One of the first strikes hit near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

The post What to know about U.S.-Israel attacks on Iran appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: U.S.-Israel strikes targeted Iran, impacting regional security and stability.
Attacks occurred near Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's offices, escalating tensions in the Middle East.
Boston residents may face increased geopolitical tensions affecting local security policies.

articles.title: The Latest: US and Israel attack Iran as Trump says US begins ‘major combat operations’
articles.description:
Iran’s Foreign Ministry responded to the joint strikes Saturday, saying that the country “will not hesitate” in its response to the renewed military aggression.

The post The Latest: US and Israel attack Iran as Trump says US begins ‘major combat operations’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: US and Israel launched strikes on Iran amid escalating tensions on February 28.
Iran's Foreign Ministry vowed a strong response to the military actions.
Boston residents may face increased security measures and potential economic impacts from the conflict.
